SELECT lt.lec_seq, lt.lec_nm, lt.lec_enr, lt.lec_contents, lt.lec_tm, lt.lec_gl, lt.lec_pl, lt.lec_st, lt.lec_ed, lt.enr_user, lt.upd_user, lt.rm_seq, contA.total FROM tb_lecture lt, (SELECT lec_seq ,TO_DAYS(substring_index(lec_ed,' ',1)) - TO_DAYS(substring_index(lec_st,' ',1)) total FROM tb_lecture ) contA WHERE lt.lec_seq = contA.lec_seq AND lt.user_id =#{loginId} AND lt.lec_seq = contA.lec_seq
and lt.lec_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and lt.rm_seq LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND 1=2
LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS tot_cnt FROM tb_lecture
SELECT lec_seq, user_id, lec_nm, lec_gl, lec_pl, rm_seq FROM tb_lecture WHERE lec_seq =#{lec_seq}
